lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: I believe loans rather than grants is the way to help build self sufficiency in the long term, by helping in a way that doesn't ruin self esteem.
lender.occupational_info: I solve networking problems for companies that are too small to afford a full time employee specializing on network support.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a mom, as a librarian, and with horses.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: it feels good

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: Sometimes you need money to make money. I want to help women who are trying to support themselves and their families.

lender.name: Lawrence & Linda
lender.loan_because: To help people become self sufficient, and in turn help others.
lender.occupational_info: Retired Tax Collector and business person.

lender.name: Alana
lender.loan_because: so people can be healthy and earn a living to feed their families,

lender.name: Paul
lender.occupational_info: I license computer software to large companies to help their businesses run smoothly and make them money.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I love helping people.

lender.name: Länna
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and able to pay it forward so other individuals have an opportunity to succeed and be blessed as well.
lender.occupational_info: Office Manager - I work at a computer all day.

lender.name: Nadege
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to those who have less, because I am lucky to have a lot.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people. I've travelled extensively and have seen how other people live, and I realize they aren't as lucky as some of us here in the United States.
lender.occupational_info: Before retiring I was a police detective, and investigated crimes. I also prosecuted criminals through the court system.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: I want to give hard-working women the opportunity to become financially independent and grow to reach their potential.

lender.name: Meghan
lender.loan_because: it is my way to help those people who have been afforded fewer opportunities than myself and work hard to improve their life and their family's lives.

lender.name: SLSS CGW4U Mr.Harper
lender.loan_because: We have learned about how important entrepreneurs can be to local economies and to the global economy.
lender.occupational_info: We are 16-18 year-old students in Grade 11 and 12 in Mr.Harper's class at Stephen Lewis Secondary School in Mississauga, Ontario, Canada

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: We are all part of the same family. When one of us is not happy, it is up to the rest of us to help however we can.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer my time in various ways: playing clarinet in musical groups that give concerts in schools, churches, and nursing homes; helping raise money for homes and schooling for children who need special care. I also take care of my husband, my father and mother, and my garden, and I am a mother and grandmother.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 4th grade at a large elementary school. I have twenty-three 9 and 10 year old students in my class.

lender.name: Rafi
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who need some help to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sophomore in high school.

lender.name: Doug MacNeil
lender.loan_because: I grew up in the town that is the home of the Coady Institute (http://www.coady.stfx.ca/). Its just the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Nova Scotia Power- Trenton Generating Station, Supervisor, Utility Services

lender.name: Capt!n Ken
lender.loan_because:
Kiva's mission melds perfectly with Schumacher's ("Small Is Beautiful") concept of village-based economics (Buddhist Economics), a concept that appeals to me. It is the socially-minded, right-thinking, pragmatic thing to do. And surprisingly, it is also the environmentally right thing to do: you are not providing tractors when hand tools will do; you are not providing help that requires an environmentally violent, destructive and costly infrastructure to support.
Kiva works at the right scale - the human scale. I want to be part of the "pay it forward” consciousness. It is just a small contribution towards making this a better world to live in.

lender.name: Harmen Jan
lender.loan_because: I'm so incredible blessed, that i just want to be a blessing! God be the glory and honor for that!

lender.name: Craig Shaw
lender.loan_because: if you give a man a fish you can feed him for a meal, give him a rod and he can feed himself for life.
lender.occupational_info: Writing letters

lender.name: christine
lender.loan_because: i want to start my own business to sustian me.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: we are all in this thing together

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I'm a former banker and a current development worker, and this is where the two sides meet -- right where individuals need working capital.
lender.occupational_info: I manage grants and am the main point of contact for our home office for relief and development efforts in South Asia.

lender.name: AVID
lender.loan_because: We want to empower these people with the ability to take care of themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: We are a high school class in Gilbert Arizona. Teacher: Lisa Knipp

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I am seeking a loan to start a new non profit foundation for education. I am trying to raise $5,000 for establishment fees, thank you !
lender.occupational_info: Aiding & assisting people to obtain a proper education.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life
lender.occupational_info: I have worked with charities for over 20 years, mostly in accounting.

lender.name: Sebastian
lender.loan_because: I think that we have the obligation to share the wealthy God has blessed us with
lender.occupational_info: I am a Lawyer. I try to help people with problems with law.

lender.name: Chanthea
lender.loan_because: I do it out of the goodness of my heart not my head and it makes me feel good to know that I'm changing someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Failure Analysis on Seagate's hard drive.

lender.name: Isabel
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe that if we all get together, we could eradicate poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I translate from one language to another.

lender.name: Matt & Stacey
lender.loan_because: Other people loaned money to us to start our business. We're returning the favour.
lender.occupational_info: Writing & Publishing

lender.name: Julie
lender.occupation: Director, Operations for a hotel company

lender.name: 2nieces
lender.loan_because:
The family of David Malone requested that expressions of sympathy be made in the form of donations to a local library, nature conservancy, or by participating in micro-lending via the website kiva.org.
Kiva.org touched my heart. What a way to celebrate life!
I decided to get my 2 nieces involved in the selection process to inspire them just as Dave has inspired his children, his family and all the people he came in contact with.

lender.name: Abhishek
lender.occupation: MBA Student at Mays Business School,Texas A&M Univ

lender.name: poliana
lender.loan_because: I need money to buy clothes and resell Because I have a small child and I am unemployed.
lender.occupational_info: Seeing clothes from door to door.

lender.name: Liliana
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed
lender.occupational_info: I'm a college student who just wants to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I loan because it helps people who genuinely need a helping hand. Plus, it makes me feel all warm and fuzzy ;-)

lender.name: Evamarie
lender.loan_because: I love helping people and I want to contribute something to the world. I also really like the feeling of being connected to the people I am lending to.

lender.name: Belly Sutra, LLC
lender.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurs dedication to making a living of their talents, and it feels good to support others and be supported.
lender.occupational_info: It is very rewarding spending so the time with the natural resources to co-create products that help people look and feel good about their skin (and what they are putting on/into their bodies).

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: People have helped me when I have needed it and I want to help people now that I can.
lender.occupational_info: Archaeologist, Contributing Editor at an Archaeology website.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I believe we have an obligation to help others if we can.
lender.occupational_info: I operate a small market which sells instead of items, shares of businesses that people want to help grow.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: It is the lesat I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Officer in the United States Army. I have spent most of my career in the Middle East. I respect and appreciate the people I have met on my missions.

lender.name: Katy
lender.loan_because: No one can do it alone.

lender.name: Sonnenbad
lender.loan_because:
It feels good ... :)
Other important sites for good deeds are in my opinion:
http://Betterplace.org
http://Reset.to
http://Helpedia.org
Sunny greetings

lender.name: Samia
lender.loan_because: I received an award with a colleague and we decided it should go to help others: little by little I am placing some of it here.
lender.occupational_info: Describing your work to someone across the world isn't easy, but I'm a doctor who tries to teach other doctors (and myself) how to be wiser when facing difficult moral problems in medicine.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Christ calls me to help others
lender.occupational_info: I work in the hospital Emergency Room

lender.name: Cheri & David
lender.loan_because: We have been so blessed - it is a pleasure to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: We both work in different sectors of the oil & gas industry

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I would like to give back to those who are not as financially fortunate as me.
lender.occupational_info: I manage people and things to make sure projects are completed on time.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help someone accomplish their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a ITS help desk helping people fix computer problems.

lender.name: Mori Love
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great investment ; In people...
lender.occupational_info: Designing solutions for the world.

lender.name: Gabriel
lender.loan_because: I like giving people the opportunity to make positive changes in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I would describe my job as working with a doctor who specializes in the area of the mouth. I take x-rays, and I help the dentist in procedures such as tooth extractions.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to help others become able to support themselves and their families.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I feel very good about joining this movement to help alleviate poverty in our world.
lender.occupational_info: I foster spiritual and emotional healing in dying people and their families.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I love Kiva because it connects people. I wish Kiva's entrepreneurs great success.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed. Kiva loans are a simple way to help someone improve their life which will in turn make the world a little bit better place to live.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky in my life and am grateful for the opportunity to help!
lender.occupational_info: I work for the City of Henderson, Nevada, outside Las Vegas.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: One small gift can help change the life of another. Its not a hand-out but a lift up!
lender.occupational_info: Manage and promote events

lender.name: Si A.
lender.loan_because: It's helping others prosper more, which makes me feel good because they feel good.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I am so grateful for having ENOUGH- enough to eat, enough to pay for school, enough to pay rent and enough to stay warm. The best way to show gratitude for having more than ENOUGH is to share the extra!
lender.occupational_info:
I'm paying my way through college by working with Special Needs (disabled) adults.
Proud to be a member of TeamObama! :o)

lender.name: Cheree & Aaron
lender.loan_because: We feel our lives are blessed and want to make a difference in someone else's life. We also love the idea that this program helps others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We help people find a place to call home.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that my small amount of money can really help someone support their family and rise out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my children and go to school to study journalism.

lender.name: wainaina
lender.loan_because: others get a chance to make a difference in their lives.

lender.name: Simeon
lender.loan_because: No matter where we are in this world, we meet each other on the same road.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a law student so I would describe my work (studying) as NEVER-ENDING!!! But it will pay off (and those loans better pay off too).

lender.name: Kirsi
lender.loan_because: I believe that empowering the poorest - and especially the women - will benefit the Whole on a global level.
lender.occupational_info: I run a Marketing Management company

lender.name: Mike and Rebecca
lender.loan_because: To do some good while we're here.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a brilliant way to incite positive change. I believe in the power of one. One small drop in the bucket, multiplied by the masses, can eventually fill every bucket.
lender.occupational_info: I facilitate workshops that foster peacebuilding, empowerment, restorative justice and philanthropy. I work with youth, teachers, organizations, communities and businesses.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: people need help and I can do something about it.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with those willing to work to better themselves
lender.occupational_info: I teach middle school mathematics to 8th grade students at a public school.

lender.name: Gretel
lender.loan_because: i'm hopeful
lender.occupational_info: i help disabled kids and the mentally ill keep their legal rights

lender.name: alice
lender.loan_because: there is no reason not to.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: This is my way of giving back. I started my own business and all these people need so little to do the same thing. It will make such a difference in their lives.

lender.name: Garrison
lender.loan_because: in the world that we live in today, it is not enough to simply look after yourself or your country. If someone asks for help and I have the ability to help them, I will, no matter where in the world they are.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at California State University, Chico. I am studying theater and hope to become a professional actor some day. I am currently studying the techniques of Augusto Boal who uses theater as a means to help the oppressed peoples of the world.

lender.name: JPFnewyork
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do. I have been blessed and giving back is part of the rent you pay to be on this earth.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.occupational_info: I teach at an International school.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: When you help others, you can't help helping yourself. Love all, Serve all

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe in making the world a better place!
lender.occupational_info:
"Truly I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers and sisters of mine, you did unto Me."
Matthew 25:40

lender.name: Kazuki
lender.loan_because: I believe this is the one of the best way to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: Research & Development in image processing and recognition area

lender.name: Mynaziq
lender.loan_because: We believe microcredit is a great tool to help people out of poverty
lender.occupational_info: I sell food!!!!!! n my wife is a full time student

lender.name: Ella
lender.loan_because: it is a way of helping people shape their own future.

lender.name: Nathanael
lender.loan_because:
I'm able to help, because I have a good-paying steady job and more money than I need to sustain a good and happy life and therefore I have a responsibility to share that surplus which I do not need with my neighbours in less fortunate circumstances.
I also think Kiva is great concept; I donate to local and international aid agencies who help people in need with medicines, accommodation and such but there's more to life than just having somewhere to sleep and something to eat - and I think Kiva and their partner agencies helps people and particularly entrepreneurs realise their dreams and achieving something in building better lives for themselves and their community at a level above just basic needs.

lender.name: Dietmar
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship, and In Private Loans with low interests.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Entrepreneur now working in the Internet Industry. Project development and Online Marketing. I am always here to help, young , talented and hardworking people.

lender.name: Wilton
lender.loan_because: I would like to give people a chance to create a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Just chillin'

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I would like to be helpful to those who need just a little extra assistance to get to where they want to go. It is a small role that we lenders play, as the entrepreneurs are doing all the hard work. I admire them.
lender.occupational_info: I represent the United States overseas, and I like to make positive connections between my country and others around the world. Although lending via Kiva is not related to my work, it is done in the same hopeful spirit.

lender.name: MICHAEL
lender.loan_because: I have traveled the world, am currently working in Africa and Europe, have been a war correspondent in Bosnia and the Middle East. I have seen what a small investment can do to enhance the growth of an individual.
lender.occupational_info: My company provides architectural design and engineering services around the world. Personally, I handle the business affairs and keep the company moving forward.

lender.name: Henk Buis
lender.loan_because: I have a lot of respect, for the fact, that people want to better their life, for themselves and their families. I wish them the best of luck with their endevours :-)
lender.occupational_info: Designing for web and print almost 15 years now.

lender.name: Warren
lender.loan_because: I think this a wonderful idea and is what life is about (helping people).
lender.occupational_info: It's just work at this point. Eventually I hope to do my own thing and be financially free. Don't we all want to be???

lender.name: Cloudia
lender.loan_because: "I want to live, I want to grow, I want to see, I want to know, I want to share what I can give, I want to be, I want to live" ~ John Denver

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I have had more opportunities than anyone should reasonably expect. I believe that I should help those who have not had as many.

lender.name: Hugh
lender.loan_because: In my travels around the world I have come to see how fortunate some of us truly are. I want to give back some of the opportunities I have received. I'm just glad I can do this.
lender.occupational_info: I travel to various locations to monitor aircraft maintenance

lender.name: Magnus
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great way of helping people.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I think it is a way to empower people rather than cause dependence
lender.occupational_info: I work with youth in jail. The youth have done bad crimes but considering their situations they have survived. I hope to break the cycle.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: Giving inspires hope.
lender.occupational_info: I train surgeons to use specialized surgical instruments.

lender.name: Megan and Ben
lender.loan_because:
"Faith by itself, if it is not accompanied by action, is dead." -James 2:17, NIV
"Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could only do a little." ~Edmund Burke
lender.occupational_info: Megan teaches children with special needs. Ben manages a sales team in the veneer industry.

lender.name: Brianna
lender.loan_because: I want to help others by sharing what God has given me. :-)

lender.name: Radhika
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed and want to give back! I want to make the world a better place to live - and especially help women entrepreneurs with small loans that will hopefully help them get out of the vicious cycle of poverty and support themselves and their families. Finally, "No one has ever become poor by giving." - Anne Frank
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations and individuals become stronger and more successful by helping them use the resources and strengths that they already have!

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to help others get their start to return the kindness of those who helped me.
lender.occupational_info: Build buildings for ourselves and others

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I am a human being.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: we are all one.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: Microloans are a great way to help people trying to better their lives.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Kathy & Jeff
lender.loan_because: There are so many people who are working so hard just to get by. I think it's the least I can do!
lender.occupational_info: Kathy is a nurse who works in a hospital, implementing new computer systems. Jeff is recently retired.

lender.name: maddy
lender.loan_because: I loan because my sisters godmother gave both me and my sister a gift certificate for kiva. It is fun and exciting to led and the best part is that you know that you are helping people all around the world!
lender.occupational_info: I am a student who lives in calgary. I am in grade 5 and i am having lots of fun learning all of the different subjects.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I can. Small amounts can make a big difference. I have been blessed with opportunity and I want to pay it forward in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a technology company that is developing a quantum computer

lender.name: Marten
lender.loan_because: We can all make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Providing alternative energy solutions in Africa.

lender.name: Chinni, Mei and MeiXin
lender.loan_because: we want to help.

lender.name: Koma
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses improve how they do their business.

lender.name: Jaideep
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help a politician make good decisions

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: ... I create opportunity and goodwill. Thank you Kiva for making the process fun and easy!
lender.occupational_info: I'm an Integrated Reporting Specialist.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Sandra & Chuck
lender.loan_because: It's fun to follow our loans and help people at the same time.

lender.name: charles
lender.loan_because: I would like to take my business to anoyher level
lender.occupational_info: I buy farm produce from farmers for resale to markets where local farmers can not reach

lender.name: Dinyar
lender.loan_because: It feels wonderful to make a positive difference in the lives of others. I would HIGHLY encourage others to get involved in Kiva. Don't just talk about it, please get involved and grow the movement. Make a positive difference in a Kiva entrepreneur's life today! :-)
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in the exciting world of New Product Development for the leading global provider of intelligent online legal workflow solutions.

lender.name: Clare
lender.loan_because: I am very interested in local entrepreneurship in the developing world and want to be a part of the ingenuity and energy of the empowered individuals Kiva has found!

lender.name: Keyur
lender.loan_because: Hardworking people around the world get chance to succeed and improve their lives.

lender.name: Knut & Eirik
lender.loan_because: We want to help people to make their own business

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I was given the opportunity from a birthday gift certificate here. But I think it's a wonderful idea, and I love idea of helping someone that really needs help.

lender.name: martha
lender.loan_because: to assist others in need.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: in honor of my grandmother who passed away.
lender.occupational_info: teaching children

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I believe we have a life to spend not just money - and how we spend it is far more important. Having said that investing money in someone so that they can 'spend' their lives more successfully is a great honor.
lender.occupational_info: I write books and work with teams and organizations to help them become more collaborative.

lender.name: Denise --Renton, WA
lender.loan_because: My husband has his own business, and I am a teacher. We want to help other families start their businesses, and help students become educated.

lender.name: NancySomers
lender.loan_because: I see this as a wonderfully personal way to make a difference in the lives of others.

lender.name: Chick
lender.loan_because: The birds insisted.
lender.occupational_info: I help develop new medicines.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I stumbled across the site and decided I'd have to be pretty shallow not to at least try a couple of small loans
lender.occupational_info: I work from home online - its boring and dull but it makes me rich in time which i value above money.

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: I have a smart relative who gave Kiva credits as a gitf.
lender.occupational_info: I work with organizations that help make communities healthier, better places to live. My job is to help those organizations accomplish their goals.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: These people deserve something for their ingenuity and sense of enterprise! I'm happy to help!
lender.occupational_info: I'm 50 years old this year, with a wonderful family - 2 teenagers, and an art studio for painting. I take care of the home, the kids and my soul.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference!

lender.name: Clay
lender.loan_because: My passion has always been design, creativity, and new ideas. This is a way to help others follow theirs.
lender.occupational_info: I design and produce video games and interactive experiences in London, England.

lender.name: Lauray
lender.occupational_info: business owner

lender.name: Paul & Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to add value to new entrepreneurs not only by money but also by experience.
lender.occupational_info: I am the founder of a software company.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I recently had life give me a chance to change my life financially and I feel like it the right thing to do to share it with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a museum planning events - business parties, weddings, etc.

lender.name: Consuelo
lender.occupational_info: I help workers.

lender.name: CaroleRonRachelKelly
lender.loan_because: Carole and Ron (grandparents) want to share the joy of helping others with our grandchildren. After we read One Hen, the Rachel and Kelly wanted to make a loan.

lender.name: Eleanor
lender.loan_because: I believe in humanity above any other principle and my conscience can't take not lending.
lender.occupational_info: I have a Masters in Media Studies and work in research. I received my undergraduate degree in Anthropology, which is also where I caught my first whiff of micro-credit.

lender.name: Nilash & Gemma
lender.loan_because: teaching a man to fish is better than giving a man a fish

lender.name: Noah
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people with kids. My mom and I decided to give a loan together with a gift from my grandfather.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.occupational_info: I help business owners achieve thier goals through integrating a vision with strategy and implementation steps

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: it gives me a chance to help others help themselves. I also know where all my money goes, and they get 100%. Then when the loan is repaid i get to give someoe else a chance at a real future.
lender.occupational_info: I look over mortgage loan files for fraud. Then if i don't find any i submit to a lender in hope they will lend my client money on a house.

lender.name: Bran Schelin
lender.loan_because: I've been afforded many an opportunity in my life. How could I not take advantage of this one to in some small way do the same for others?

lender.name: Russell and Catharine
lender.loan_because: we care!

lender.name: Adam Greenberg
lender.loan_because: i can help
lender.occupational_info:
Adam Greenberg is a 2007 graduate of the University of Miami. A Bowman Foster Ashe scholar, Adam earned a Bachelor of Science with a degree in psychology and minors in biology and business administration after changing majors about six times.
Adam currently enjoys the privilege of serving as an intern in the administration of President Barack Obama at the White House Council on Environmental Quality.
Prior to this, Adam spent the summer up in Portland, OR, where as a 2009 Fellow with PolitiCorps - a progressive public policy initiative of the Oregon Bus Project - Adam and 22 other Fellows learned real-world applications of leadership skills and campaign savvy. They registered voters, organized communities, vetted public policy white papers, launched media campaigns, and more.
A busy year for Adam, he spent the first half of 2009 in Santa Monica, CA as an intern with TOMS Shoes; an incredible for-profit company where with every pair you purchase, another pair of new shoes is given to a child in need. One for One.
On the ‘08 Campaign Trail, Adam lived on and traveled the country aboard a school bus converted to run on recycled waste vegetable oil and with solar paneled electrical power. Working with 12 other young people as an environmental education non-profit called BioTour, he went to colleges and high schools across the country, speaking with thousands of students and presenting pathways toward sustainability in renewable energy, our potential in green jobs, and perhaps most importantly, by simply advocating for a more active and participatory democracy - a truly educated electorate.
And prior, Adam had one of the best years of his life - serving with AmeriCorps*NCCC, rebuilding homes through Habitat for Humanity with the people of New Orleans; tutoring in a 6th grade math class; and reading and playing with kindergartners in Biloxi, MS, among other great experiences.
As a student activist in college and recognized as a 2007 Fellow of Young People For, Adam spoke out for the rights of his campus janitors to form a union as they wished and earn a more livable wage.
He enjoys a fair bit of ping-pong, live music, good conversation, and is a regular lender of Kiva.org. Adam was born and raised in Wantagh, NY.
-- "Power concedes nothing without a demand. It never did and it never will." — Frederick Douglass, 1857.
"Discontent is the first step in the progress of an individual ...or a Nation."

lender.name: Nathalie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who were born less fortunate to improve their life circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: Creating connection, that's my passion! Between organizations and purposes, management and staff, senders and receivers, reason and emotion. I have over 10 years experience in comprehensive customer and stakeholder engagement and master the subtleties of traditional, social and cross-media. For Power2Improve I provide workshops, training and advice on marketing, communications, public relations, social media, journalistic writing, personal branding and leadership skills. Stimulating and inspiring to excel, challenging to be authentic. In short: humanizing business, helping to connect!

lender.occupational_info: I lead the Finance team for a company of about 500 to ensure profitability and compliance to law. I also sit on the executive team that sets strategic vision for the company and ensures the well being of our employees, our customers and suppliers and our shareholders.

lender.occupational_info: I am a supervisor to a government office staff of 5 women. We process vehicle titles for the public & car dealers. Titles are the legal document that shows you own that property.

lender.loan_because: I've had tremendous opportunity in my life and have been blessed in many ways. It's important to me to give back whenever possible and enable opportunities for others.

lender.loan_because: I want to help God's people.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and am learning to read and write. I also play sports and do art crafts.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I am happy to share what little wealth I have; what would probably be a great wealth to many KIVA borrowers. I look forward to their successes and am glad that KIVA exists to allow for these micro-loans.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a large jail as a Registered Nurse. The inmate population we serve is often in jail for drug or alcohol related offenses. As a nurse, I evaluate their needs for medical attention, including making sure that any chronic or acute illnesses are addressed at their admissions and that they receive the medical regimen they require.

lender.name: Lorna
lender.occupational_info: I work in scientific research.

lender.name: Plny Tvar
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish and he will be full for a day - teach him to fish and he will be fed his whole life!

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: It feels great to be able to give back some of what I have been blessed with. I think that everyone should be given a chance to better themselves and succeed in life. This is a wonderful organization to be a part of. There is nothing like the feeling of being able to help someone else who is less fortunate. God Bless the people who started this organization. This is truly wonderful work. Thanks to everyone else who gives. It is my goal to lend at least $100.00 per month. The hardest thing I find is choosing who I lend to. I wish I had a million dollars or could win the lottery because I can honestly say that after I gave to my church this is the next place I would go to distribute funds. I look at the pictures and see the faces and it just makes me smile. I love to get the emails on the updates. I read my lender page several times a week. I love to see where everyone is at and how they are progressing. The money is not important. What is important to me is that they all reach their goals. I wish I could do more to help. My daughter and I are starting and online business. We have not decided exactly what but 50% of all profits are coming here to help those who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I audit accounts of companies that come to me as uncollectable or the customer is refusing to pay. I try and contact them and see if there is a way to get the account settled. If not I then send the accounts out to attorneys or collection agencies to be resolved.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney who defends people who are in some trouble.

lender.name: James, Will & Ally
lender.loan_because: We want to help other families

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: jesus wants us to love and help one another.
lender.occupational_info: I assemble high and low pressure switches that are used in hydraulic for military equipment and vehicles to marine,farm ,construction and off -highway vehicles.ect....I love doing my job i try to learn something new every day .

lender.name: Jerry & April
lender.occupation: Sales Engineer & Stay at Home Mom
lender.loan_because: We were given a $25 gift certificate from April's mother (Brenda) for Christmas. She owns a dancewear clothing store and really appreciates how hard it is to start a business. We believe it's important to help others. We admire people that are starting their own business. We've always been the type of people that believe it's better to give than receive. It's very rewarding.
lender.occupational_info:
Jerry works in sales for a company that makes electrical equipment for nuclear reactors all over the world.
April is a stay at home mom and manages the household and looks after our one year old son John Charles

lender.name: Kathi
lender.loan_because: i should...i believe in pay it forward...i have many miles to go...
lender.occupational_info: i teach small children and i also help parents find quality childcare and help childcare professionals be of quality

lender.name: Ben McClary
lender.loan_because: I am a follower of Jesus Christ and He calls us to invest everything that He has given us in sharing His love with the world by meeting our neighbors' needs.
lender.occupational_info: I am a youth pastor in a Christian Church in Utah, USA. I lead our church's ministries to children from birth to 18 years old. I coach our adult leaders and our young people on how to live their lives for God's purposes.

lender.name: MH Holden
lender.loan_because: Travel is a passion on mine. I try to travel in a way that lets me better experience what its like for the people living in those areas. From those travels I've learned we are all the same, be it from New York or Yeji Ghana, our needs and hopes are not all that different; good health for our children, food for the nights dinner, a safe and warm place to sleep. Being able to help with a loan lets me feel, in some small part, I've continued that connection.
lender.occupational_info: I map the land. I measure how things like hills, rivers, roads, and buildings fit and relate to one another. From those measurements I then make "models" of the land and those who need to, can use that information to manage resources or engineer a road, or a bridge or a home.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I'm in a fortunate position to help other people improve their life, that of their loved ones and their community.
lender.occupational_info: Providing in-patient care to children with psychiatric problems and those with cancer.

lender.name: Beautiful Independence
lender.loan_because: We loan because we feel it is important to give back and help other people in the world.

lender.name: Danuta
lender.loan_because: everybody needs a chance to realize their dreams.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great way to make a difference right at the grassroots level.

lender.name: The Walker Family
lender.loan_because: We love you all. 1 Corinthians 13
lender.occupational_info: Right now we have everything we need, so we try to share what we can. Our family is strong and we believe in you.

lender.name: Jo Jo
lender.loan_because: There are over seven billion people on this earth. If we don't take care of each other, then life on this earth will be unbearable and full of unnecessary suffering for many. Especially for us privileged people, these loans are a small price to pay and they make a great difference to helping individuals care for themselves and their families, especially in areas where opportunities do not come knocking.

lender.name: Glen
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student and into rockets and sailing.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: Creating a sense of financial and emotional independence should be a right of every living person.
lender.occupational_info: Write grants to facility the construction of affordable housing for the elderly and disabled.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: i feel the need to help developing businesses in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: Grade 7 student

lender.name: Harmony
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: living with passion, living an artful/ heartful existence.

lender.name: April and Lourdes
lender.loan_because: We loan because we feel we are called to serve other by our Heavenly Father. We will also lift these people up in prayer that He prospers and blesses them.
lender.occupational_info: We work in an office for the US Govt.

lender.name: Jesus Loves
lender.loan_because: Our God tells us to love one another.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Every dime I make filters through Kiva before I spend it. This has done a lot to make me happier in my life.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a small difference

lender.name: Marian
lender.loan_because: I want to help women become financially independent by sponsoring women owned and operated businesses throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I hire employees for a major corporation.

lender.name: Lynette
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to be involved in agriculture and am glad to be able to help others out through Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of people's farms and animals when they are away or need extra help

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: because i want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I am a gr 9 student

lender.name: Michele
lender.occupation: Event Manager and Small Business Owner

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I make money and believe it is important to share it with those in need. I like to help people who help themselves. I like to see others get ahead in business.
lender.occupational_info: Regional director for www.dealeebob.com

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is a great step in meeting practical needs and helping individuals reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work with charitable organizations and business clients in marketing, fundraising, government relations, and grassroots political activism.

lender.name: JJMKgroup
lender.loan_because:
Julio and Jeff decided to help as many people in need as they possibly can. JJMK group was created for the primary purpose of helping people to help themselves live fuller, supercalifragilisticexpialidocious fun lives.
Thank you Lord. Thank you Jesus. Thank you Friends and Family. Julio Macias - CEO and Jeff Knapp - CFO.
lender.occupational_info: OUR MISSION. JJMK group exists to make a difference in people’s lives by bringing together the best individuals, inspiring persons to provide funds through Kiva producing an ample money stream and advancing more and more research plus developing continuous investment & improvement. We are funding projects for people to make life better and more stress-free as best we can. God bless you all.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: We are all in this world together.
